attributes.action: provide a subsidy for adult patients requiring orthodontic treatment
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Adult patients suffering from associated conditions created by the need for orthodontic treatment should be offered subsidies to help them to pay the costs of this or it should be free through the NHS for those unemployed or under a certain income.  People should not have to suffer conditions such as neuralgia and TMJ for a lifetime because they cannot afford the cost of expensive adult orthodontic treatment.
